cache

  1. - service in module cache

Custom cache service. The cache service uses browser's sessionStorage if available, and falls back to storing cached object (cached_items) in memory, if not.

Methods

  • put(item, collection);

    Store an item in cache, using its collection name & id to generate a unique (cache) key.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    item Object

    Item to cache
    collection String

    Collection name of the cached item

    Returns

    false if item has no _id property, undefined otherwise.

  • get(item_id, collection);

    Get an item from cache.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    item_id String

    Item id that was used when storing the item in cache.
    collection String

    Collection name of the cached item

    Returns

    Object

    Cahced item or {} if item was not found.

  • clear();

    Clear cache.
